column1: MEKs and ERKs inhibited IL - 6 activation of Stat3 harboring a mutation at serine - 727, the major site for serine phosphorylation, similar to inhibition of wild - type Stat3, and inhibited Janus kinases Jak1 and Jak2 upstream of Stat3 in the Jak - STAT - signaling pathway.

The Cdk2 - cyclin - D1 complex did not phosphorylate any tested substrates, such as H1 histone, pRB, SV40 large T antigen, p53, E2F - 1 or a preparation of nuclear proteins from HeLa cells; in contrast, Cdk2 - cyclin - E and Cdk2 - cyclin - A phosphorylated these proteins.
